# name of project and executable
PROJECT(multiTaskTutorialExample1-3)

# use CMake provided script to locate FLTK
FIND_PACKAGE(FLTK REQUIRED)

# add include paths
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${multiTaskTutorialExample1-3_SOURCE_DIR}
                    ${FLTK_INCLUDE_DIR})

# magic CMake command, generate .cxx and .h from .fl files
# then compile them and link them with the executable
FLTK_WRAP_UI(multiTaskTutorialExample1-3 displayUI.fl)

# name the main executable and specifies with source files to use
ADD_EXECUTABLE(multiTaskTutorialExample1-3
               # code files to compile
               sineTask.cpp
               displayTask.cpp
               main.cpp
               UITask.cpp
               # header files are provided for information
               sineTask.h
               displayTask.h
               UITask.h
               # files generated by fluid
	           ${multiTaskTutorialExample1-3_FLTK_UI_SRCS}
	       )

# this program 
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(multiTaskTutorialExample1-3 ${FLTK_LIBRARIES})

# link with the cisst libraries
CISST_REQUIRES("multiTaskTutorialExample1-3" "cisstCommon;cisstOSAbstraction;cisstMultiTask")
